content.detailedDescription:
I have reported this to mufon via phone after seeing i was not the only one whom have seen or reported this on this website i decided to add my own visual of event.

i woke up close to 6:30am on the 14th of dec and decided to go outside to have a smoke as soon as i walked outside a bright object due south/east of me caught my eye, it was very bright and at first i thought it was venus but then i spotted venus at about 2 o'clock position from the initial object in question i knew then it wasn't venus, i found it very odd as i glanced at it some more it got brighter so i ran inside and dashed for my camera and started to record iwas able to catch venus and as i aimed the camera toward the unknowned light i the sky it seemed to vanished.... 

now my video may or may not have caught the unknown light, i can't seem to find it of yet but i know where it was when i review the footage.... 
the video data also stamped time of recording as dec 15, 2010 6:40am with 45 seconds this purpose of report is to confirm the other 2 reports on mufon. 

note: the orange circle represents where in the area the mystery object (is/was) at moment of taking video. the pic included is a snapshot from actual video.
content.summary: Bright oval light i thought was venus at 1st which wasn't

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i saw an honest to god ufo last night at about a quarter past midnight.
 my wife was looking out the bedroom windows and shouted to me in the living room, 'hey look out the window...Hurry! we have a skyline view of san francisco looking east from a hilltop about a mile from downtown. 
 i saw what my wife was looking at immediately and shouted ' what the 'f' is that!' it was coming toward our apartment building slowly at about the same speed a that a helicopter would fly and i've seen lot's of those.
 there was a truly bizarre, glowing, orange ring in the sky coming toward our building. the cloud layer was low over the city but, the skyline was plainly visible. the orange ring was under the clouds heading west toward the ocean. it was really, unmistakably different from anything i've ever seen. it was like an oval ring of bright orange plasma...Hard to focus on like neon but intense like fire. it made the clouds glow slightly. it might have even been just inside the lower boundary of the cloud layer. 
it moved very smoothly with no jerkiness whatsoever and it was silent with absolutely zero, blinking lights.
 it flew over our eight story tall building and out of our field of vision. we both ran downstairs in our pajamas and outside onto the sidewalk hoping we could still see it.  
 we could! it was still moving slowly west but, looked like it was going up, too. i considered going back upstairs to get a camera but, decided it would be gone before i could get back with it so, we both just kept watching it. sure enough, it started fading out of sight as it seemed to climb back up through the cloud layer.
 my wife and i went back upstairs and sat on the couch talking about it for awhile.I was thrilled...She was really nervous and obviously shaken up by the experience. 
 my wife thinks i'm nuts when i watch ufo shows on tv. she thinks it's all bs. well, maybe not so much now. she kept asking what me what i thought it was; if i thought it was really an alien spacecraft. she was asking me what does it mean. of course i didn't really have any good answers.
 it wasn't like anything i'd ever seen before. i've never claimed to have seen any ufo before. nothing i've ever seen comes close this.
 i can't imagine anything, even remotely, technologically feasible st this time by anyone on this planet.
content.summary: Fiery orange plasma ring over san francisco moving slowly east to west

content.detailedDescription: To be provided
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multicolored lights with air movement sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south to work this morning on i-295 and noticed way above the town of yarmouth a shiny silver object. at first i thought it was a bird since there was a flock nearby, but then i noticed that the object appeared to stay very still, it was too high in the air to be a bird and it was shiny, reflecting light from the sun. i looked away for a second and then back and it had moved its location slightly. i had to keep driving but i'm positive it was a ufo.
content.summary: Shiny oval shaped ufo hovering over yarmouth

content.detailedDescription: I left school @ 7:00p.M. and was getting off i-215 and on to the i-15 on ramp heading south and was passing the 7200 south off ramp and saw 3 large red circular lights fading from on to off in a tri-lateral pattern just above the freeways lights.  they were about 50 ft above the top of lights, and as i passed one of the street lights i not only saw the three red circular lights i saw the triangle shape (black/rust color).  this craft was stationary and not moving.  now that my senses were heightened and eyes focused and scanning the skies the rest of the way home i started noticing all the aerial craft in the night skies.  roughly ten-fifteen minutes later i was coming up to 14600 south and noticed another set of lights in a triangle formation over the point of the mountain.  i thought this looked much bigger and the large lights were white on each corner of the craft and one small blinking red light in the center of those three.  so i thought that it was just a commercial air liner, but as i got closer to getting over the point of the mountain i could see a faint black outline of a triangle shaped bottom to pyramid topped craft becoming more crisp and clear that was moving eerily slow over the freeway heading east.  it was @ foot hill height (so i'm guessing about  ft).  traveling at roughly 15 mph.  i tried to pull over but i was in the fast lane so i couldn't pull over safely fast enough in rush hour traffic. it was huge.  i would say about 50 yrds in length or more and 30 yrds in  height at least.............I was in awe.
content.summary: Driving south on i-15 and saw triangle ufos 2 times in different lacations within 10 mins of one and other.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on riverside drive in toluca lake/north hollywood. i saw something flashing above me at a stoplight. about 30 stories high moving slowly toward hollywood over the hill. at first i thought it had something to do with christmas because it looked like a fan made of giant white christmas wreaths flashing in a pattern across the fan. there was onw flashing blue or white light that looked normal like on a helecoptet or plane. i followed it as it slowly moved toward hollywood. i didn't hear any loud sound when i stuck my head out the window. it wasn't flying weird or anything bit i don't know how anything we have could be shaped like that and fly. it was probably about four cars side by side wide...Not sure...
after i lost sight of it a police helicopter came flying around the sky with its searchlight on. 
did anyone else see this??
i'm really freaked out!
content.summary: Weird flashing fan

content.detailedDescription: Driving with companion in car, in wooded area of rt 23n mts on lhs. area of new foundland/sparta area just before stockholm. noticed ofject in sky flying across rt 23 to mt range. 9pm or alittle after, about 200 ft in air. night time. very large triangular shape, moving very slowly, bright light in front and "markers" on it with a strange bright light on the bottom or side in a long line pattern. no sound. first came at a steady pace, when we noticed it it seemed to slow down, then speed up to the mts.
content.summary: Rt 23 nightime triangular approx 200ft  multiple lights moving slowly to mts well over 1000 ft

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my patio looking at the stars having a cigarette when i started hearing the sound of what sounded like a small cessna plane flying over. we don't get any cessna's flying over so i thought it was strange. i kept watching, and to my total shock i saw a triangle appear over the building next door (appartments). it was flying low enough to make out that it was definatly a triangle with two bright "headlights", and as i watched it fly over me my mouth was dropped wide open, and i was completly speachless. as it passed overhead, i noticed light hitting the undercarriage and it appeared to have some kind of bar across the sides of the bottom, but i could only make out one side of the belly. when it was completly overhead, i noticed a back light on the back tip of the triangle. there was only the three lights though, no light in the center of the belly. it was not using any kind of spot light or anything. it was just traveling overhead like it was on it's own agenda. i popped my head out from the overhang of the patio to really get a good look and see if i was really "seeing" this. it continued flying over my complex, and disapeared from my sight after flying over my building. at that point, i started calling my husband [first name removed-cms/dr] several times, and he just didn't hear me calling for him. i guess i wasn't loud enough.

like i said, it sounded like a cessna, but there was no way! it was clearly a triangle. i wasn't scared of it, just shocked. i have seen pictures on tv and in books of the famous "triangle", but never saw one myself. i'd love to see it again. the whole time elapsed was about two minutes. i then looked at the clock and it said 11:00pm (california time). 

i tried to go to sleep after at about 12:00 midnight, and found it difficult to fall asleep. as i laid there, i heard that exact same sound again! i laid in bed (out of shock) and heard it for about an additional 15 minutes!

now, nearby in mountain view, we have an old nasa base, but they don't test military planes there. we also have a secret military base up in the santa cruz mountains, and god only knows what they do up there. this was smaller than the stealth, and anyway, it made a motor noise. there's no way it was a hang glider at night either. that's just not possible in the area i live in. 

i have always believed in "ufo's", and also believe i had several experiences as a child. but this is the first time in my adulthood that something like this has happened. i hope that it really was a "ufo", and hope to hear from you if your getting any other reports about last night. it wasn't that late, and people were still up.

the picture i am attaching is not one i took. it's just the closest i could find on the internet to show what it looked like. just a few changes though. there was no light in the center of the undercarriage. just the three white lights at the tip.
content.summary: Triangle, point end in back, one light on back, two in front (headlights) white/grey undercarrage

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on i-20 west of the campus exit.  i looked up and noticed a double z-shaped contrail.  as i didn't want to be late going where i was going, i decided that there wasn't time to stop and take a picture. so, i took pictures through the windshield while driving.  the enclosed picture was taken just past the i-35w off ramp.
these contrails/clouds/whatever are becoming more frequent over texas.
although, i have seen and photographed this type of formation before, i have never seen nor heard of two of them together.
content.summary: Double "z" shaped contrails

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:53 p.M. on thursday dec 16th, 2010, i was on my way back from work, located near hiwasse, ar.  i drove down highway 72 towards centerton, then turned right on the 102 spur to come into town.  after making the right turn, i went around a corner to the left.  immedidiately after making that corner, i looked at a white house that sits on the right.  above the house was a large, triangular shaped object that looked black, although it could have been a different color as it had already gotten dark by that time.  the object had 2 large lights and one solid light.  all 3 lights were white.  i did not see any red lights.  at first i didn't notice any of them flashing.  the object was banking and flying very slowly, so that it appeared to be hovering.  it looked like it was just down the street a little and back towards the west.  i was excited to see it and thought that i would pull into a nearby apartment complex to get a better look, but before i reached the apartments the object had completed its turn and leveled out, now flying east then southeast.  i rolled my window down but didn't hear anything.  the object rose slowly and headed out towards the interstate.  it was then that i noticed the 2 large lights on the back flashing while the smaller one was not.  i looked but never saw a red light.  i followed down to the stoplight across from mcdonald's, waited for the light to change, and then turned onto highway 102 towards bentonville, all the while watching it get further away and continue flashing.  i only went as far as sonic as my sister's housing complex, siena estates, is right after sonic and i was headed to her house.  i turned left into the complex and stopped, looking out my passenger and back windows to see the object.  i saw the large back lights flash two more times and then it was too far away to be seen due to its distance and due to the dark tint on my windows and the fact that i had to keep going forward to avoid holding up traffic. the entire event lasted about 10 minutes, and the object appeared to be flying very slowly and staying pretty low to the ground, only rising as it got over the interstate.  i asked my brother-in-law, who is a pilot, about any planes flying out of the xna regional airport to see if they fly towards centerton and then bank while heading out over the interstate.  he said they do, and that i might have seen a c-130.  i told him i didn't see a red flashing light, and he said it might have been on top and i wouldn't have, but i don't think that's the case.  first off, i flew in a c-130 while a marine, and the object appeared more triangle-shaped and not like that of a plane, plus it was flying very slowly, especially while banking.  i've done a lot of flying myself, and don't see how a plane could stay in the air if it was flying so slow that it at first appeared to be hovering.  i would like to know if anyone else has reported anything unusual, or if there was a large plane leaving xna airport around 5:53 p.M.  this is all of the information i can recall.  please let me know if i can help further.  thanks.

*(wit's name deleted -- cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dark trianglular shaped object with 2 big flashing lights on back and one solid smaller white light on front.  banked very slowly then flew over interstate i-540.

content.detailedDescription: I was jogging in the dark very early before work on a country road in rural maine. it was a clear, calm, and starry night with no moon. the stars were very bright and i was watching the sky as i ran down the road. there were no leaves on the hardwood trees yet, and i noticed a bright light moving through the sky. it was east of south east, traveling slowly toward the west, at about 30 degrees or so above the horizon. i couldn't see it very well at first because it was low enough in the sky that i was looking at it through the tree branches. this part of the road had a slight rise and was pointed in a south easterly direction so the light was just a little toward my left and it seemed that at the rate it was going,it would soon pass in front of me where there were no trees over the road. the rise in the road crested about 1/10th of a mile in front of me before it went back down the other side. at the crest of the hill was an empty house on the right side. about another 10th of a mile on the other side of the hill was a house that had a streetlight in their driveway that cast a very faint glow in the atmosphere. the street light itself was not visible, just its faint glow.  intrigued, i waited to see what the moving light might be as it soon would pass across the road within my view. when it passed over the road i saw it was much larger and closer than i had expected. it appeared to be just above the tree tops and took up the entire space over the road between the trees. the light that i first saw through the trees was really three lights, not one, and they looked more like very large windows that were round in appearance. the quality of the light was like it was comming from within, like the windows on a house rather than headlights on a plane. the three windows also appeard to be in a row that curved around the object with the one on the left of the three pointing directly in my direction. this "window" appeared to have some sort of a grid on it. the others didn't as far as i could tell. there was a row of smaller lights that ran along the left side of the craft that were white and amber in color. the craft was between me and that streetlight i described earlier because the glow from that streetlight had the object in the sky backlit enough that i could make out its outline on the side where the small row of lights were. but the three "windows" were bright enough that i couldn't make out the outline on that side. i looked hard for the red and green running lights or the blinking lights that conventional aircraft have but these were not there. it was also totaly silent. it was a calm night and i noticed i was able to hear a tractor-trailer downshifting to get up the hill that was on the main road about 3 miles away to the south west but this object in front of me made no noise at all. while i was describing to my self what i was looking at so i would remember the details, the object appeared to stop in the sky right over the road in front of me while i stared and studied it for perhaps 30 seconds.  then i realised it hadn't stopped but had changed it's direction and was comming towards me and declining in altitude as well. my next thought was to get out of the way in case it was a disabled aircraft comming in for a landing on the road.I began to stumble into the bushes off the side of the road in the dark to get out of the way. before i got more than three steps off the road i became aware of a change in the light out of my peripheral vision and turned to look back. the craft had made a 90 degree turn back toward the west and continued slowly and silently on its way. for some reason it suddenly occured to me that what ever it was knew i was there and was comming in to check me out but when i ran, thought it had scared me and changed its mind. this was a really strong feeling and i have no idea where it came from because never did i feel scared. i had been thinking it was some sort of a small plane until it made that abrupt turn and kept going at treetop level away from me. it went over the empty house on the crest of the hill, just above the treetops, and proceeded across the field behind the house. i began to run as fast as i could up the hill to try to get to the top where i hoped to get another look at it as it crossed the field but before i could get there, the lights simply vanished as if they were turned off. when i got home about 45 minutes later i immediatelly drew a picture of what i had seen. i went to work and told the first two people i saw that morning about it but was so ridiculed that i have only told a couple of other people about it since.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow silent craft at treetop level with three large "windows"

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) and i **(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) were driving to concert in downtown rochester, ny.  we decided to meet up with her brother ***(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) at the rit campus so he could drive us from there.  he knew how to reach downtown without having to go onto any highways so he took us on side streets to reach water street music hall.  ***(name deleted) was driving his car, *(name deleted) was in the passenger seat and i was behind her in the back.  while heading down scottsville rd, near an 84 lumber, *(name deleted) noticed something of to the left of the car.  she asked, "what is that?"  to which i replied, "oh, it's just one of those altitude warning lights.  you know, to warn any planes nearby that they shouldn't fly that low in that area."  right after finishing that sentence *(name deleted) said, "umm, no.  it's now moving."  the once stationary object that had two big white circular lights, multiple blinking white lights and a red light, that made me initially think it was a warning light of some sort, was now rising from it's spot that was 50ft(approximately) in the air.  as soon as *(name deleted) made me realize that thing object was actually moving it made me focus much more.  it was then that i realized that there was no structure underneath it to be holding it up and then i began to pick out the shape of it.  the best way that i can describe it is if you were to press down on top of a ball and make it look slightly oblong.  the color of it was so dark that it almost perfectly blended in with the night sky.  it took ***(name deleted), who was driving, a few seconds to realize that the same light that he saw was the thing *(name deleted) and i were noticing and yelling about.  he almost immediately pulled his car into a parking lot and stopped so we could watch this object.  the trajectory that the object took off in could be best described as this, if you were to hold a boomerang in your hand so that the part you were grasping was vertical.  after lifting slightly it then smoothly made the near 45 degree transition and took off into the night sky.  this all happened within about 30 seconds and the object moved so far out of our sight that the two big white lights blended into one and we lost visual contact with it.  it was after not being able to see it anymore that we realized that we heard no sounds what-so-ever throughout the entire time that we had visual contact with it.
the only feelings we had afterward was excitement and amazement.  we truly couldn't believe that we experienced what just happened.  *(name deleted  and i instantly both called our mothers and told them the story.  i proceeded to text numerous friends, that are interested in the paranormal, about my experience.
the attached picture is the best way that i could visually describe it.  my fiancee has not seen this picture that i drew yet.  i am planning on having her draw her own sketch, without seeing mine, and comparing the two together.
content.summary: Hovering, oblong object, lifts up and quickly speeds away into the sky

content.detailedDescription: Often, when the sky is clear, i look out bedroom window briefly before sleeping. this past tue. at 11pm i looked out at a pretty clear sky and, after a min., saw a star pattern in the distant east that incl. 3 stars in a perfect line. as i continued to watch, i realized that the pattern of 9 stars (later aware of two smaller sattelites) was slowly moving straight across the sky toward me. i thought, wow, i'm finally seeing something. i noticed that the pattern was not moving in a normal rotational direction as all other stars do. it came in a straight line, slowly and never changing formation. i quickly got my binocs.(7x35/8*)and after 30-35 min. i thought it was going to pass out of sight over my roof but it stopped just short of the roof overhang. i noticed that in addition to the 9 primary stars, there were 2 smaller, less bright sattelites that could only be seen with the binocs. during the next 25-30 min. saw the usual stars rotate towards the south but the pattern sat still. during the 1/2 hr. or so the pattern very slowly eked west (prob.Rotation related). a little ways s.E. of me are the fermi towers and i wondered if this ufo's observance had anything to do with them, hoping not. at about midnight, with nothing else happening, i went to bed. the following day i looked around the web, hoping to see some confirmation, but nothing. they were basically the same brightness as any star (way,way up there) and moving slowly so i understand why they weren't obvious. i wish i could show you the pattern because it included 2 perfect rows of 3 and a perfect triangle on the right end. none of this surprises me, because of my reading for the last 4 1/2 yrs. but it was a trip because it was the first sighting for me!
content.summary: Multi star pattern coming from east. staying in unchanging formation. stopped

content.detailedDescription: I was heading to work crossing the causway going into riverview when i noticed a glowing object going from west to east at 6:47 it was directly over findlay blvd about 300 meters away from me and about 400 ft in the air. i pulled over on the offramp which leads to coverdale road and continued watching it . it had no blinking lights at all and when it passed me i could see the back of it and it glowed a redish orange colour. it was not going very fast and from the side i could barely see it but when it passed it was quite visible. if anyone else saw it please contact me. thanks.
content.summary: Glowing object.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out my window. saw 1 disc. seemed to be white on top with metal underside. it was going from west to east and kept tilting and going higher so i saw white then metal, white then metal etc.
content.summary: Flying disc

content.detailedDescription: On or about july 9, 2010, getting off exit at i-77 and rockside road and while stopped at light in independence, oh, at approximately 7:45 p.M. sky was very clear, beginning of dusk in area. saw 3 orange orbs in tight (but more flat than narrow) v formation with orange wakes the width of each orb and one orange orb trailing about twice the distance of the space between the orbs in the v, the trailer orb aligned with the center orb. i commented to my husband who, of course, couldn't see them from his angle! i watched them move westward. they passed in the vicinity of an airplane and the plane looked as though it was standing still in comparison. it was quite exciting. i listened to the news and checked the papers the next day and did not hear a word about it.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs in a v formation trailed by one orange orb

content.detailedDescription:
Phone report taken by mufonheadquarters, as this witness has called us numerous times in the past several months about these lights and she has no computer access. witness called in and told hq business office the following: not verbatim, taken from notes.  

 on 12/14/10 about 20 lights went off and broke into a big circle, double or triple the size of the moon. the moon was out, not full, and clouds. the lights move slowly, are orange, red, bright lights.
she says she sees the lights every night, and has for about 7 years. when she looks through binoculars, or her reading glasses, it looks like fireworks. she has a few witnesses who have seen things w/ her, a boyfriend, a friend.
 she would like someone to investigate, please call her.
content.summary: See detailed narrative.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work, same route that i've taken for the past nine years. i work in the vicinity of bradley int'l airport and witness planes coming and going from the airport for the second half of my trip every night. i'm used to seeing aircraft of all sizes and light patterns coming and going from multiple directions depending on wind and weather, but have never seen an aircraft come in from the direction this one did and that's what caught my attention first. i did a double take as it came closer over the trees to my left (east) and my first thought was "where the hell is he coming from??"  then i noticed the light pattern and the size of the area between the lights... indicating this craft was huge compared to the passenger jetliners i see every night. i rolled my window down, realizing i may be seeing reflections of other things in the glass but no, it was precisely what i saw through the open window. 

i watched it make what seemed to be a tight left turn and it reminded me of a child's toy, a top the way it seemed to stand on the bottom point of the v shape and turn to it's left. it appeared to be banking left by the way the lights moved in the night sky as that was literally all i could see. i couldn't even see an outline of a shape. 

all i could see of this object were the three very bright lights, two synchronized red lights(one on the tip of each side of the top of the v) they blinked in unison slow and steady. the light at the bottom point of the v was bright white and remained on the entire time, it did not blink at all. i have to say it was one single object because all three lights moved as if they were connected to the same object, there was no variation or hesitation from one to the other.

i thought to myself how smooth its flight was, almost graceful and thoughtful.

the object then crossed over the road in front of me leisurely, i estimate less than a mile away, crossed rte 140 and appeared to be heading toward bradley intl airport... i blinked (literally) and it was gone. i didn't see it leave, it was just no longer visible. i don't know if that means it left in a hurry, disappeared, or if the lights simply were no longer visible to me at that angle. 

i haven't been able to get it out of my head and have been trying to find online any military or other aircraft that would have that light pattern and size. i cannot find anything and a friend told me to report what i saw here and gave me this link. thank you.
content.summary: Large v-shaped object making tight turn over rte 140 in east windsor area

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my friends house in his back garden and we was on his trampoline when something inside me was telling me to look up and check out the sky so i did so and as i was looking i seen this tiny oval star-like object spinning and changing colour from green to red to amber i told my friend and he was amazed not long afterwards we went back to my house were i thereafter watched it from my bedroom window.  

i knew it was a ufo/alien spaceship because i am interested in ufos and learn about them on they internet so i was sure of what it was then after i watched it disappeared and i didn't see it again, even though i had another ufo encounter a couple of days later when i was walking down my road and i seen this square/rectangle object flying silently about 150ft above the row of houses it had the same colours as they other ufo but the colours were brighter i did get a picture but i later lost my phone that week so i am going to upload a picture of my friend who also took a picture. 

when i describe these two objects on the information form i am describing both of them.
content.summary: See detailed narrative.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the today show, an interview live, the capital behind him and to his right a stable white object was sitting, it then moved to his right out of sight. we watched it as it moved. a good sized object.Was white and round. looked solid and glowed.
content.summary: On today show on an interview, infront of the capital, to his right was an object

content.detailedDescription:
Mid summer, after dark. a few friends and i were sitting on my front step enjoying the warm evening and one of my friends saw a red light in the sky that was moving very very slowly. it was above and behind my house in the western part of the sky. it was moving in a northerly direction.
it was very very bright red, a lot like an led light, very intense color. it was very high up, and looked about the same size as jupiter is in the sky, pretty big. it moved extremely slowly-almost unnoticeably slow.
we all became very excited and curious as to what it was. i ran inside and grabbed my video camera and began to film it. i have not been able to find the video since then, when i do i will definitely email it! 
when i zoomed in i could see the bottom of the light was flat. the object was 90% spherical but with a flat bottom. there were no noises, no flashing, although the light did pulse slowly. it would dim and then grow brighter. the whole cycle would take around 40 seconds or so. the pulsation was very easily noticed on the recording, but not so much on from the naked eye.
after i had filmed it to my satisfaction i put my camera down. then it faded from visibility, it didn't just vanish. not sure whether it disappeared because of distance or if the light just faded to nothing. 
i recall being very excited, this being the second time i've seen a ufo, that i was actually able to film this one. i don't recall any communication on any level with this object.
content.summary: Slow moving red light ufo

content.detailedDescription: Took the dog out and.I look to the north over the city and saw a cylinder object moving back and forth turning bark green and then white and rowing up and down.I went into the house to get my mother in-law to see this and when.Got back out it was gone.
content.summary: Thing

content.detailedDescription: Ok first let me start by saying this is going to be my last report on these, because nobodys following up on it. the lights started appearing as single lights then after a while came on in a row of light up to 6 at a time, then at one time the light came on in a row one would come on then it appeared to jump or just another light came on and what made it odd as the lights were coming on in a row from left to right they started coming on from right to left, hard to explain but it came on like this direction----> o o o o o as a new light appeared the one behind it would go out, then they came on in this direction <---- o o o o o and there was no hesitation soon as it went from left to right it went right back from right to left. very odd and very cool to watch, i've now seem them 5 times just in the month of december alone, before that it was 8 months before i saw these lights in the sky. this is final report until someone takes this serious ...You know maybe come check it out for yourself or look up in the sky between abilene and brownwood, from 6pm - 7pm not saying they're on a schedule just seems to be the time they appear. good luck ..Watch the skies
content.summary: Orange lights, watched them for 45 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Last event of a sighting, was with wife and two daughters at the edge of the everglades. it was a circular disk shaped craft with a clear toped dome, the craft was glowing a soft yellow, hovering at a fourway intersection above a tall row of pine trees.... if u contact me i will tell u all i know.....Concerning a lifetime of abductions,sightings and direct communications. 
i dont care if u think me crazy but they implanted a probe up my rt nostril, when i was a child, which i have explicid memories of, as well as the pain and poped my sinus cavity, placing a very small barbed ball in the front of my brain, i guess ,because they would communicate telepathecly with me whenever they chose to.
1.I was contacted mentally with a vision of where they wanted me to meet them in the everglades.We were on an unlighted back country road coming home from a friends house, suddenley there it was just hovering at aproximately 30-40 feet at the top of pine trees. 
2.We all saw it from the car as we approached it hovering, slightly ahead bobbing above the pines 3. we all knew it was a saucer shaped ufo instantly,not of this world
4.Disc shaped with a pale yellow glow and a clear domed top, floating and bobbing slightly as it moved alomg the treetops. it was 80-100 yards across.It led us down a side dirt roas that was a dead end at the embancment of the water of the everglades.
5.I was only too familiar with such an event, i said nothing as not to influance the reactions of my wife and daughters, after it came down to hover in the water at the end of the dirt road on the embankment a fog came out of nowhere and covered the car. i began to step out of the car with the opening of the car door and my wife screemed, "no dont", the next thing i remember i was comming too from the heysterical screaming of my daughters in the back seat, i found myself back in the car once again recalling the abduction of myself and my family.
6.Contact me if u need more information, the leader, as ive always known him is about 6' tall, enlarged crainium, huge deep, pure black eyes, no ears,tiny holes for a nose. a thin indescrible mouth, long very thin neck, exceptionally long thin apendages, overall frail looking, and a light grey skin color. i have made a drawing of the leader who has always dealt with me. his name is garfleen.  {the ship was still hovering in the water as we attempted, disoriented and freaked out by my daughters begging me to leave. it remained there as we drove away as fast as possible.
content.summary: Constant abductions, sightings and interactions since 3 1/2 1947

content.detailedDescription: Last night after taking dogs out in backyard, i saw this really bright  light in south eastern sky. i went back inside house to go upstairs and get a better view from upstairs window. i also got my wife to come and look. we watched the object for about 15 minutes. the object stayed in same position for about 10 minutes,then moved west for a few minutes slowly, then just vanished. there were some clouds in sky last night but not near object at the time. it definitely was not an airplane or helicopter. ive lived near airport my whole life and have seen thousands of planes before and this was way to bright and big to even come close to compare it to. the object pulsated a few times even brighter, it changed colors like a star twinkling in sky, i looked through my binoculars also and can distinctively see it changing all different colors, red, blue, green, yellow, but at the same time it always had a bright white light coming from it continually. i also took a short video of it from my camera, it doesn't have a good zoom on it, but you can definitely see how bright it was in comparison to the street lights in video. i will transfer video when i  get home. i also checked the reports of ufo sightings and someone else posted about same object, but at different time. i was really excited to see that other people seen this also!! i hope more reports come in and.Ill be ready with a better camera if it comes back.
content.summary: Extremely bright starlike huge object

content.detailedDescription:
My moms friend that lives about 4 miles away called and said to look in the sky to see the slow moving lights that she had seen the day before that would get low and shine a spotlight of some sort down on the ground. 
we made our way outside to the back pasture to look for these "aliens".  we spent at least 10 minutes observing them before the 3 flying objects went away, they seemed to be playing ring around the rosie in a counterclockwise direction. each "ufo" had green red and white flashing lights as to be an actual legit aircraft of some sort.  you couldn't see the shape of the objects.  from a distance the appearance of these lights glowed like the light of a fire inside a lantern.  my parents and i didn't witness any lights shining down to the ground as the friend did the night before with these objects.  when they were almost overhead, you could hear a motor but it wasn't the sound of a helicopter or an airplane.  i called my local police station which didn't know about it and they said they would send someone out in the vacinity to look into it.  one by one these objects seems to stop the circling formation and disappeared from our view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 objects flew in large slow circles counterclockwise in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Now i am reporting this before i take off for work...So i am in a rush, so hope this makes sense. this thing was hanging very far away from me to the southeast...I am located in park ridge.  at first, i thought it was venus, it was the brightest thing i have ever seen in the sky.  even with the sun coming up...It was very noticeable.  now i am reporting this before i take off for work.  even if people were not looking in that direction would be drawn to notice this gigantic object...Even if it was just venus.  there has to be more witnesses...Chicago commuters on trains and subways or waiting for the train and cars heading on the kennedy or i-90 east...With a clear view toward the southwest would have seen it for certain. all these folks are heading that way...Stuck in traffic...They had to have seen this thing.  

oh...And aircraft were taking off in that general vicinity from o'hare, absolutely gigantic bright light...In a perfect circle.  why was it not venus?  because out of nowhere...After a few seconds...The damn thing just all of sudden...Vanished!!  it did not fade away...Or get covered by clouds...It just shut off.  i waited for it to reappear, and sure enough it did...And then started moving west clear as day...It moved west for about 2 seconds...Then disappeared again.  

i grabbed my camera and went outside hoping it was coming in this direction...I waited and waited and waited...And looked up.

there was the real venus...Tiny.  i am speechless right now...That was, by far the coolest thing i have ever seen.  in surrounding areas southwest of chicago...They were even closer and the view would have been absolutely spectacular...It was almost blinding bright...Like nothing i have ever seen before. it was like a gigantic ball of lightning...Hovering...Like some big planet, but it vanished, re-appeared...Moved west slowly...And disappeared again.

you can see venus right now...In the midwest...It is tiny. what the hell was that thing?  anyone else see it?  i hope to see additional reports when i get home from work!!  especially those of you from the southwest side of chicago...Anyone with a clear view from those areas would have had the best view of it...It was also one of the largest moving crafts i have ever seen in the sky...Beyond anything normal...Planet size.
content.summary: Brightest object i have ever seen in the sky southeast of chicago.

content.detailedDescription:
December 14, 2010

for the 4th straight days in a row now, i been seeing this small, white and round object just appear in the air from my prospective in the same general area in the sky around 1:15 pm in mesa, az.   i filed a report yesterday alerting everyone to be on the lookout for this object.  if you weren't able to observe the object yourself, the pictures attached is what i took of it today.  tomorrow is forecast to be cloudy.  information about the object can be seen in december 13, 2010 report that i filed.
content.summary: Dim and sometimes bright round object seen slowly traversing high in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom spoke with me after dinner, telling me of a meteor shower in progress.  this is nothing out of the ordinary to me, having grown up on the big island of hawaii there always seems to be such an opportunity.  
i live on the kona side of the big island and my house sits 3 miles from kailua pier.  i stepped out just after our talk to watch right around 8:30pm .  nothing to see for the most part.  better than half a moon out, slight cloud cover over hualalai.  
only the brightest stars stood out over the moonlight, including the north star and most of orion.  i heard the sound of a jet engine, (perfectly normal) shrugged it off.  however, it continued longer than normal, so i looked up.
it was a perfect triangle of red lights.  big deal.  military has a newfangled weapon.  5 minutes later: same sound, same flight path/slightly more south.  ok, big deal, right.  
what cooks my noodle is the two visible anomalies happening between the aircraft.  one was a visible cluster of faint stars which aligned like the 3 sisters.  
i watched as it became the square brothers and so on...  not only did the number of 'stars' change, but the intensity and color would change dot to dot without any clouds nearby.  the other anomaly, (to my right when looking up the mountain) was a venus lookalike with slight, sporadic lateral/vertical movement.  by venus, i mean red/orange.  these objects will probably still be there as i type this.  i have seen too many to not put in two cents at least.    
i was happy to see them for another night in a row- first time for me.  i stopped counting how many anomalies i've seen.  first one will always be the best.  ...  silver ball, clearest day you can find.

i would like to talk to someone who is interested and willing to listen.
content.summary: Military triangle watched by star-like

content.detailedDescription:
There were actually two seperate events on the same day.  the first was around noon. my thirteen year old daughter saw this, i did not and she helped me in writing this report.  she is homeschooled and in ninth grade, so she is home during the day. she heard a very loud sonic-boom type sound and the ground shook.  she looked out our front downstairs window and saw an extremely large bell-shaped object, almost like a giant hershey kiss candy- brownish-silverish in color.  she could see two grey chinook helicopters, one on either side- one slightly in front of the object on the opposing side, the other facing her was closer to the object's rear. to compare the size of the object with the chinook's size- the object being a hershey kiss candy- the chinook would be no larger than an ice-cream sprinkle.  they were flying beyond a tree line around residential areas, we belive above an area of open land set for possible future housing.  they seemed to dissapear and my daughter witnessed two black helicopters right afterward flying the same path.  during this event my daughter also saw some neighbors across the street, closer to the described object, come outside- two parents and a small child.  she said that they all pointed toward the object, appeared to be screaming, then the mother went inside, quickly returning with a video camera.  she thinks they might have gotten footage as the object and chinooks were not traveling very fast.  the child was crying and all seemed very disturbed and went quickly inside their house after the event was over.  we do not know them personally and have not approached them.

the second sighting was later that evening around 6:30 pm and it was dark by that time.  some of my kids and i were leaving the house and went outside to get in the van.  this time my thirteen year old daughter, my seven year old son and i all saw an object in the same place and same direction that the other object was traveling earlier.  i saw what appeared to be an  enormously large object, obviusly round in shape to some degree as there were several lights in a round formation.  i recall red and clear or yellow lights but couldn't see a bell shape for sure.  my daughter saw the faint outline of the same bell or hershey kiss shape she saw earlier but with lights in red, blue, and yellow around the base and one red at tip. we did not hear any loud noises nor did the ground shake this time and there was no evidence of any other planes along with it this time.  it dissapeared beyond the trees.  i remember yelling "what the frig is that?" or a similar expletive and just being held in awe by the size and apparent low-flying flight path of the object.
content.summary: Enormous bell shaped object surrounded by two chinooks
